snippet: The nonprofit organization, which subsidizes the publication of five volumes of poetry a year, is short $25,000, its director said on Wednesday.
abstract: The nonprofit organization, which subsidizes the publication of five volumes of poetry a year, is short $25,000, its director said on Wednesday.

headline.main: National Poetry Series, a Promoter of Poetry in Print, Faces a Shortfall
headline.print_headline: National Poetry Series Faces a Shortfall
